file_content.text: I was just wondering how I might serve you better, master. I'll start this task immediately.
I promise nothing less than perfection, master.
Your peace of mind is my highest priority. Rest assured, this will be done to perfection.
You have but to ask, master. Consider the matter handled.
I will exceed your expectations, master.
I found a way to improve upon your specifications, master. I trust you don't mind?
You deserve nothing less than the highest possible quality, master.
Perfection delivered on schedule. It was my pleasure to serve.
My results were less than ideal, master. There is no excuse for this failure.
Even the most advanced droids cannot make a shimmersilk purse from a bantha's ear, master. I promise to do better next time.
